subject: Fw: Thanks for your recent refinance debt request, we are ready to lend money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$462,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this plain form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://doabcoacking.com/
